title: If we are in the 21st century and a century is 100 years, where did the 20th century go? - Quora

response.answer_text: The year 2000 marked the beginning of the 21st century. The 1900s were the 20th century. Each century appears to be a hundred years ahead because many people assume the first century took place from 100–199 when that isn’t the case. The very first century took place from 0–99. The 2nd century was 100–199. The 3rd 200–299 and so on. As a bonus fact the year 2000 also marked the THIRD Millenium. 0–999 was the first, 1000–1999 was the second.
